{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.12827v1", "title": "Direct Sum of Lower Semi-Frames in Hilbert Spaces", "summary": "In this paper, structural properties of lower semi-frames in separable
Hilbert spaces are explored with a focus on transformations under linear
operators (may be unbounded). Also, the direct sum of lower semi-frames,
providing necessary and sufficient conditions for the preservation of lower
semi-frame structure, is examined.", "main_category": "math.FA", "categories": "math.FA", "published": "2025-04-17T10:40:54Z"}
